official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the Resolution Trust Corporation should follow asset disposition procedures which provide incentives for the prompt and efficient disposition of assets.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Congress, after consulting the Resolution Trust Corporation, should establish a performance method of asset sales before approving any additional loss funds for the Corporation.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the Resolution Trust Corporation should follow asset disposition procedures which provide incentives for the prompt and efficient disposition of assets.
